label: applicableTradeProductCertification
comment: A certification applicable to this trade product.
A product certification applicable to this specified material.
The trade product certification applicable to this product batch certificate.
The trade product certification applicable to this product certificate.

rangeIncludes.comment: The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.

domainIncludes.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a product batch has met required criteria.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
